title: 2022 Canyon Spectral in affordable AL alloy, including Young Hero kids trail bike
content:
Probably the biggest news out of Canyon’s wide Spectral family launch is really the updated alloy range with three much more affordable aluminum all-mountain models, with the same 150/160mm travel, same capable modern geometry, and either 27.5 or 29″ wheels now – just like the carbon bikes.
